articles.content:
An awful performance saw a sluggish Wolves lose 3-0 in front of an angry Molineux crowd, marking their seventh defeat in 10 games.
In the aftermath of the defeat, Lage says he will now analyse his s… [+2070 chars]

articles.description: MANCHESTER UNITED could lose Cristiano Ronaldo to Real Madrid in this summer's transfer window.

articles.author: Ian Herbert
articles.title: Brilliant stadium, fans onside and Son-Heung Min up top... What more does Antonio Conte want? - Daily Mail
articles.description: IAN HERBERT AT THE TOTTENHAM HOTSPUR STADIUM: It is hard to imagine a conversation with Daniel Levy resolving things this summer, given that the budget didn't even satisfy him at Chelsea .
articles.content: Antonio Conte was in another of his dark outfits and spent much of the 90 minutes with a face like thunder, fulminating, pointing and generally living up to that image as the Godfather on the T-shirt… [+5087 chars]

articles.title: Antonio Cassano threatens to stop watching Barcelona if they sign Romelu Lukaku from Chelsea - Daily Mail
articles.description: Barca have been linked with Lukaku after a dismal season for the striker on his return to Chelsea - and ex-Real Madrid forward Cassano will boycott games if manager Xavi signs the Belgium hitman.
articles.content:
Chelsea record signing Romelu Lukaku cannot string three passes together and would be hopelessly incapable of adapting to Barcelona's heavily possession-based blueprint, Antonio Cassano has warned.
